mapper.select:
SELECT b.id, b.room_number, b.bed_number, b.status, b.elders_id, b.created_at, b.updated_at, e.name AS elderName FROM beds b LEFT JOIN elders e ON b.elders_id = e.elders_id
AND b.status = #{status}
AND b.bed_number LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')
ORDER BY b.room_number, b.bed_number
mapper.insert: insert into beds(room_number, bed_number, status, elders_id, created_at, updated_at) values (#{roomNumber}, #{bedNumber}, #{status}, #{elderId}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
